QUERY_DETERMINISTIC_GOLDEN_RECORD_CANDID.text: eq(national_id) or (eq(given_name) and eq(family_name) and eq(phone_number))

QUERY_MATCH_GOLDEN_RECORD_CANDIDATES_BY_.text: match(given_name,3) and match(family_name,3) or match(given_name,3) and match(city,3) or match(family_name,3) and match(city,3)
